00020 #include "machineStatus.hh"
00021 
00022 machineStatus::machineStatus(machineStatus const& oldStatus) {
00023         spindleStat = oldStatus.spindleStat;
00024     F = oldStatus.F;
00025     S = oldStatus.S;
00026     coolant = oldStatus.coolant;
00027     plane = oldStatus.plane;
00028     endPose = startPose = oldStatus.endPose;
00029 }
00030 
00036 machineStatus::machineStatus(gp_Ax1& start) {
00037   clearAll();
00038   startPose = start;
00039 }
00040 
00041 void machineStatus::clearAll() {
00042   F=S=0.0;
00043   plane = CANON_PLANE_XY;
00044   coolant.flood = false;
00045   coolant.mist = false;
00046   coolant.spindle = false;
00047   endPose = startPose = gp_Ax1(gp_Pnt(0,0,0),gp_Dir(0,0,0));
00048   spindleStat = OFF;
00049 }
00050 
00051 void machineStatus::setEndPose(gp_Pnt p) {
00052   endPose = gp_Ax1( p, gp_Dir(0,0,1) );
00053 }
